# spreadingAngle

**Instance Property**

The range, in degrees, of randomized initial particle directions. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var spreadingAngle: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the direction specified by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emittingDirection] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthDirection] property. For example, at the default value of `0.0` degrees, all particles emit in the same direction. Increasing the spreading angle to `30.0` degrees allows particles to emit in any direction within a space shaped like a cone whose central angle is 30°.

This property has no effect if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthDirection] property value is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleBirthDirection/random].

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Managing Particle Emission Locations

- **emitterShape**: The shape of the region of space where the system spawns new particles.
- **birthLocation**: The possible locations for newly spawned particles, relative to the emitter shape.
- **SCNParticleBirthLocation**: Options for the initial location of each emitted particle, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthLocation] property.
- **birthDirection**: The possible initial directions for newly spawned particles, relative to the emitter shape.
- **SCNParticleBirthDirection**: Options for the initial direction of each emitted particle, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthDirection] property.
- **emittingDirection**: The initial direction for newly spawned particles. Animatable.
